## MediaType type

MediaType is the combination of Audio, Video, and Images

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MediaType = AudioType | VideoType | ImageType | UnspecifiedMediaType;
```
<b>References:</b> [AudioType](./stentor-models.audiotype.md)<!-- -->, [VideoType](./stentor-models.videotype.md)<!-- -->, [ImageType](./stentor-models.imagetype.md)<!-- -->, [UnspecifiedMediaType](./stentor-models.unspecifiedmediatype.md)
